ygData.subject: Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: I know what you mean exactly! I don t understand at all why horses are so expensive... it s not like they do that much. Being a druid, I don t need one for
ygData.messageBody:
I know what you mean exactly! I don't understand at all why horses are so
expensive... it's not like they do that much. Being a druid, I don't need
one for fast transportation. It should be easier to get one. A lot of people
only buy them because they think others will praise their characters. I get
so annoyed with it, I turn horse graphics off a lot! That way NO ONE has
one, LOL.

-= Mippon - Level 40 Druid Halfling =-
